sqlMap.delete: DELETE pano_order_shopcart , pano_order_shopcart_detail FROM pano_order_shopcart LEFT JOIN pano_order_shopcart_detail ON pano_order_shopcart.sn = pano_order_shopcart_detail.shopcart_sn WHERE pano_order_shopcart.user_sn = #userSn#;
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO pano_order_shopcart ( USER_SN, HOUSE_PACKAGE_SN, PURCHASE_NUM, ADDER_SN, ADDER_NAME, ADD_TIME, UPDATER_SN, UPDATER_NAME, UPDATE_TIME ) SELECT #userSn#, _house_pk.sn, 1, -1, 'system', NOW(), -1, 'system', NOW() FROM pano_project_house_package _house_pk WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT _house_style.sn FROM pano_project_house_style _house_style, pano_project_house _hosue, pano_project_style _style WHERE _house_pk.HOUSE_STYLE_SN = _house_style.sn AND _hosue.sn = _house_style.HOUSE_SN AND _style.sn = _house_style.STYLE_SN AND _hosue.sn = #houseSn# AND _style.sn = #styleSn# AND _house_style.PROJECT_SN = #projectSn# );

INSERT INTO pano_order_shopcart_detail ( SHOPCART_SN, PACKAGE_TYPE_SN, PACKAGE_PRODUCT_SN, ADDER_SN, ADDER_NAME, ADD_TIME, UPDATER_SN, UPDATER_NAME, UPDATE_TIME ) SELECT _order_shopcart.sn, _pk_product.package_type_sn, _pk_product.product_sn, -1, 'system', NOW(), -1, 'system', NOW() FROM pano_project_package_product _pk_product, pano_project_package_type _pk_type, pano_project_house_package _house_pk, pano_project_house_style _house_style, pano_project_house _hosue, pano_project_style _style, pano_order_shopcart _order_shopcart WHERE _pk_type.house_package_sn = _house_pk.SN AND _house_pk.`HOUSE_STYLE_SN` = _house_style.SN AND _pk_product.package_type_sn = _pk_type.sn AND _order_shopcart.house_package_sn = _pk_type.house_package_sn AND _hosue.sn = _house_style.HOUSE_SN AND _style.sn = _house_style.STYLE_SN AND _hosue.sn = #houseSn# AND _style.sn = #styleSn# AND _house_style.PROJECT_SN = #projectSn# AND _order_shopcart.user_sn = #userSn# GROUP BY package_type_sn;
